Holy Week Mass Schedule
Monday - Wednesday - 
8:15 AM Mass

Holy Thursday - 
8:15 AM  Morning Prayers
7:00 PM  Mass of the Lord's Supper
(Eucharistic Adoration to Follow)

Good Friday - 
8:15 AM  Morning Prayers
12:00 PM  Stations of the Cross
2:30 PM  Solemn Liturgical Service
7:30 PM  Tenebrae Service

Holy Saturday - 
No Morning Prayers
No Mass
12:30 PM - Blessing of Easter Baskets
8:00 PM - Easter Vigil

Easter Sunday - 
9 AM - Mass
11:30 AM - Mass
(No 7:30 PM Mass)


Rectory Office will be Closed 
Friday April 19 - Monday April 22

Regular Mass Schedule

  • Mon - Fri  8:15 AM
  • Saturday 8:15 AM, 4:30 PM (Vigil Mass)
  • Sunday 9:00 AM, 11:30 AM, 7:00 PM  

Confessions

  • Saturdays, 4-4:20 PM

Eucharistic Adoration

  • 9am - 9pm Mon-Fri in the Chapel
     

Parish Rectory Office Hours

  • Mon - Friday: 9AM-4:30 PM 
  • CLOSED Noon-1PM, daily
  • Going Out of Town? Check out Masstimes.org to find a church near your destination.
